[60FPS (Hold R button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 10000000
24000034 00000000
DD000000 00000100
24000034 00000001
D0000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS]
D3000000 10000000
24000034 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}

[Default 30FPS]
D3000000 10000000
24000034 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Codes by @Hazerou}
